section.title: Introduction
section.para: A set of specialized elements are provided for accomplishing application-centric tasks. These include several HTML5 input elements with matching server-side validators, the Csrf element (to prevent Cross Site Request Forgery attacks), and the Captcha element (to display and validate CAPTCHAs).
A Factory is provided to facilitate creation of elements, fieldsets, forms, and the related input filter. See the Zend\Form Quick Start for more information.
